ygData.subject: Re: another Mindbender???
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I stopped buying any page under 30. I still cant sell all the spells I ve got. Enchanters are quite rare. I just saved a lot of money researching
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I stopped buying any page under 30. I still cant sell all the
spells I've got. Enchanters are quite rare.
I just saved a lot of money researching spells instead of buying them.
At level 16, I researched:
Levitation,
Mesmerization,
Disempower
At level 20, I researched:
Berserker Strength,
Color Shift,
and I'm going to research Endure Magic ( failed on first attempt ).
I've also sold 2 levitates and a disempower.
I'm still selling one levitate and one mesmerization.

little tip when you make level 20: buy Sympathetic Aura first! It adds 18 (
or is it 16? ) to your charisma and will save you a lot of money on other
spells!

Skara de Toxxulia <Elite>
P.S.: I ran out of bank space before the patch that allowed to stack up
spell components!!! My bank "account" is filled up with chests!
